original_text: Hear attentively the noise of his voice, and the sound that goeth out of his mouth.
korean_text: 하나님의 음성 곧 그의 입에서 나오는 소리를 똑똑히 들으라

sentences.original_text: Hear attentively the noise of his voice
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 목소리 소리를 주의 깊게 들으라

sentences.original_text: and the sound that goeth out of his mouth
